ABOUT.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Learn more about our company and mission
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_1: FirstSeller is a leading online electronics and home appliances store in Uzbekistan. We've been serving our customers with high-quality products at competitive prices since 2022.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_2: Our mission is to make technology accessible to everyone by providing the latest gadgets, electronics, and home appliances from trusted brands around the world.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_3: We pride ourselves on excellent customer service, fast delivery, and comprehensive warranty support for all our products.
ABOUT.MISSION_DESCRIPTION: To provide customers with the best technology products and exceptional service experience
ABOUT.QUALITY_DESCRIPTION: We guarantee the authenticity and quality of all our products
ABOUT.DELIVERY_DESCRIPTION: Quick and reliable delivery throughout Uzbekistan
ABOUT.ACHIEVEMENTS_DESCRIPTION: Numbers that speak for our success and customer satisfaction
ABOUT.TEAM_DESCRIPTION: Meet the people behind FirstSeller's success

TEAM.CEO_DESCRIPTION: Experienced leader with 10+ years in e-commerce and technology retail
TEAM.CTO_DESCRIPTION: Tech expert ensuring our platform delivers the best user experience
TEAM.SALES_DESCRIPTION: Customer-focused professional ensuring excellent service delivery

DELIVERY.SUBTITLE: Fast and reliable delivery across Uzbekistan

DELIVERY.STEP_2_DESCRIPTION: We prepare your order and schedule delivery

DELIVERY.TERM_1: Free delivery for orders over 500,000 sum
DELIVERY.TERM_2: Delivery 7 days a week including holidays
DELIVERY.SPECIAL_1: Large appliances require special delivery arrangements
DELIVERY.SPECIAL_2: Remote areas may have extended delivery times
DELIVERY.SPECIAL_3: Weather conditions may affect delivery schedule
DELIVERY.SPECIAL_4: Additional fees may apply for floor delivery

PAYMENT.TITLE: Payment Methods
PAYMENT.SUBTITLE: Secure and convenient payment options
PAYMENT.SECURITY_SUBTITLE: Your financial information is protected with advanced security
PAYMENT.SSL_DESCRIPTION: All transactions are encrypted with SSL technology
PAYMENT.ENCRYPTION_DESCRIPTION: Your payment data is encrypted and secure
PAYMENT.VERIFIED_DESCRIPTION: All payments are processed through verified gateways
PAYMENT.INSTALLMENT_SUBTITLE: Buy now, pay later with 0% interest
PAYMENT.STEP_1_DESC: Add items to cart and proceed to checkout
PAYMENT.STEP_4_DESC: Receive confirmation and track your order
PAYMENT.FAQ_1_Q: Is it safe to pay online?
PAYMENT.FAQ_1_A: Yes, all online payments are secured with SSL encryption and processed through verified payment gateways.
PAYMENT.FAQ_2_A: Yes, we offer 0% interest installment plans for 3, 6, 9, and 12 months on eligible products.
PAYMENT.FAQ_3_A: We accept Visa, MasterCard, and UzCard. Both local and international cards are supported.
PAYMENT.FAQ_4_Q: Can I change payment method after ordering?
PAYMENT.FAQ_4_A: Payment method can be changed before order confirmation. Contact support for assistance.

WARRANTY.STEP_2_DESC: Show purchase receipt and warranty certificate
WARRANTY.STEP_3_DESC: Our technicians will examine the product

WARRANTY.DOCS_DESC: Show purchase receipt and warranty certificate
WARRANTY.DIAGNOSIS_DESC: Our technicians will examine the product

WARRANTY.NOT_COVERED_2: Water damage or exposure to liquids

FAQ.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.SUBTITLE: Find answers to commonly asked questions
FAQ.ORDERING_Q1: How do I place an order?
FAQ.ORDERING_A1: You can place an order through our website, mobile app, or by calling our customer service.
FAQ.ORDERING_Q2: Can I modify my order after placing it?
FAQ.ORDERING_A2: Orders can be modified within 30 minutes of placement. Contact our support team immediately.
FAQ.ORDERING_Q3: What payment methods do you accept?
FAQ.ORDERING_A3: We accept cash, card payments, bank transfers, and installment plans.
FAQ.DELIVERY_A1: Standard delivery takes 1-3 business days. Express delivery is available within 24 hours.
FAQ.DELIVERY_A2: Yes, we deliver to all regions of Uzbekistan.
FAQ.DELIVERY_A3: Delivery is free for orders over 500,000 UZS. Standard delivery costs 25,000 UZS.
FAQ.PAYMENT_A1: Yes, we offer 0% installment plans for 3, 6, 9, and 12 months.
FAQ.PAYMENT_A2: All online payments are processed through secure, encrypted systems.
FAQ.PAYMENT_A3: Yes, cash on delivery is available for most areas.
FAQ.RETURNS_A1: Items can be returned within 14 days of purchase if in original condition.
FAQ.RETURNS_Q2: How do I return an item?
FAQ.RETURNS_A2: Contact our support team to initiate a return request.
FAQ.RETURNS_Q3: When will I get my refund?
FAQ.RETURNS_A3: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned item.
FAQ.CONTACT_SUPPORT_TEXT: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.

ORDER_INFO.STORE_DESC: Visit our physical stores to order
ORDER_INFO.INFO_1: All prices are in Uzbek Sum (UZS) and include VAT
ORDER_INFO.INFO_2: Product availability may change without notice
ORDER_INFO.INFO_3: Delivery times may vary based on location and product availability

SERVICES.TITLE: Our Services
SERVICES.SUBTITLE: Professional services for your convenience

WARRANTY_SERVICE.TITLE: Warranty Service
WARRANTY_SERVICE.SUBTITLE: Professional warranty and repair services
WARRANTY_SERVICE.REQUEST_TEXT: Contact us for warranty service and repair requests
WARRANTY_SERVICE.SERVICE_DESCRIPTION: Warranty and post-warranty repair of household appliances:
WARRANTY_SERVICE.WARRANTY_DESCRIPTION: During the warranty period, if the equipment fails, the customer can expect free elimination of all defects caused by the manufacturer's fault (if the requirements of the operating instructions have been followed by the customer). The warranty period is valid from the day of sale to the final customer.
WARRANTY_SERVICE.WARRANTY_NOT_APPLICABLE: Warranty does not apply in the following cases:
WARRANTY_SERVICE.EXCLUSION_2: Non-compliance with installation, operation and maintenance instructions
WARRANTY_SERVICE.EXCLUSION_3: Improper use and storage of equipment
WARRANTY_SERVICE.EXCLUSION_4: Installation, maintenance, repair or any other work performed by unauthorized dealers
WARRANTY_SERVICE.EXCLUSION_5: Any modifications to equipment design not provided by the manufacturer
WARRANTY_SERVICE.EXCLUSION_7: Damage caused by natural disasters, fires, accidents or unexpected events not directly related to equipment use
WARRANTY_SERVICE.EXCLUSION_8: Negligence and intentional damage to equipment
WARRANTY_SERVICE.EXCLUSION_10: Warranty does not apply to drainage systems, consumables, filters, external decorative coatings, batteries and accumulators, electrical wires, coolants and oils, plastic and painted parts of equipment, fixtures, brushes, nozzles, filters, bags
WARRANTY_SERVICE.EXCLUSION_11: If the warranty card does not show the following information (complete and legal): model name, model serial number, date of sale, contact information and seller's seal, contact information and installer's seal
WARRANTY_SERVICE.EXCLUSION_12: Seller - Manufacturer is not responsible for equipment failure resulting from improper installation (connection)
WARRANTY_SERVICE.REQUIREMENT_TEXT: To use the warranty, the customer must keep the warranty card and documents confirming the purchase of the equipment.
WARRANTY_SERVICE.REPAIR_DESC: Professional repair services for all types of electronics and appliances
WARRANTY_SERVICE.REPLACEMENT_DESC: Quick replacement service for defective products under warranty
WARRANTY_SERVICE.MAINTENANCE_DESC: Regular maintenance to keep your products in optimal condition
WARRANTY_SERVICE.STEP_1_DESC: Call our warranty hotline or visit service center
WARRANTY_SERVICE.STEP_2_DESC: Provide purchase receipt and warranty information
WARRANTY_SERVICE.STEP_3_DESC: Drop off product or schedule pickup service
WARRANTY_SERVICE.CONTACT_TEXT: Our warranty team is ready to help you with any product issues

RETURN_EXCHANGE.TITLE: Returns & Exchanges
RETURN_EXCHANGE.SUBTITLE: Simple and transparent return and exchange policy
RETURN_EXCHANGE.OVERVIEW_TEXT: If you purchased a quality product that does not meet certain parameters (for example, you bought an oven that does not match your size requirements), you can return or exchange the product within 10 days from the purchase date.
RETURN_EXCHANGE.RETURN_PERIOD: Return period: 10 days from purchase date
RETURN_EXCHANGE.STEP1_DESC: Come to the store branch with your passport, ID card or driver's license and purchase contract
RETURN_EXCHANGE.STEP2_DESC: Our specialists will inspect your product and send it to service center if repair is needed
RETURN_EXCHANGE.STEP3_DESC: Fill out a statement indicating the reason for return and complete the process
RETURN_EXCHANGE.DOC2: Passport, ID card or driver's license
RETURN_EXCHANGE.CONDITION2: All included accessories must be present
RETURN_EXCHANGE.CONDITION3: Product must be unused and in original condition
RETURN_EXCHANGE.NON_RETURNABLE_DESC: According to the Consumer Rights Protection Law, the following items cannot be returned or exchanged:
RETURN_EXCHANGE.CONTACT_DESC: Contact our customer service team for assistance with returns and exchanges
